text.author: aji nugraha, Jeff, Imesha San and others (see URL)
text.title: How to Make Vegan Cupcakes
text.summary: Two recipes for 18-24 vegan cupcakes (with vanilla extract for vanilla, or cocoa for chocolate flavor), using soy milk and cider vinegar, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, oil and salt, as well as optionally fruit puree, baked in the oven for around 20 minutes.
